Thanks for stopping by. (Samples below .) Did you see this movie? (It's The Usual Suspects .) If not, run, don't walk , to the nearest Blockbuster and get it. Being Dutch, I'm so cheap that I don't have one either. Given this predicament, and the dismal prospects of improvement (with no outside influence, that is), please consider making a small donation to help defray the cost of a VCR purchase. Checks and money orders can be sent to the following address. Please, send no cash. Gideon Glass 1633 Monroe, 3rd Floor Madison, WI  53711  USA Thank you for your support. Being a grad student, I sometimes find myself reading papers, even though I have two shelf-feet of unread books waiting to be read. Anyhow, if you're looking for something, here's Alf-Christian Achilles's huge index . when I was at Calvin . Try reloading it several times (or just try this ). Oh well. I suppose I should have a Netscape button here, but that MS-thing over to the right will have to suffice. In case you're here because I told you about something in my bookmarks , there they are.
